title: Maze pioneers double extortion with public leak site
description: Maze operationalizes data-leak sites and the double-extortion model, increasing leverage against victims.
potential_impact_on_malware: Enables post-encryption pressure via public data leaks; drives higher payouts

title: Mirai variants drive large-scale IoT DDoS
description: Proliferation of Mirai strains leveraging insecure ARM IoT devices for DDoS and proxy resale.
potential_impact_on_malware: Enables massive DDoS capacity and commoditized proxy networks
notes: Variant activity ongoing through 2019; scale depends on ISP filtering and device hygiene

title: Ryuk/Conti affiliates target high-value enterprises
description: Affiliate-driven operations expand, focusing on enterprise ransomware with multi-million USD demands.
potential_impact_on_malware: Accelerates ransomware scale via professionalized affiliate model
notes: Conti emerging from Ryuk; campaigns intensified during 2020

title: TrickBot/QakBot loader infrastructure fuels ransomware
description: Persistent loader and malspam infrastructure provides initial access, credential theft, and staging for ransomware.
potential_impact_on_malware: Sustains large-scale initial access and lateral movement for ransomware operations
notes: Acted as a feeder for multiple ransomware families across 2020

title: DarkSide hits Colonial Pipeline; REvil exploits Kaseya
description: High-profile critical infrastructure incident (Colonial Pipeline) and supply-chain event (Kaseya) illustrate impact of enterprise ransomware.
potential_impact_on_malware: Demonstrates severe operational disruption and multi-tenant extortion via supply chains
notes: Colonial Pipeline May 7, 2021; Kaseya July 2021; both drove global response

title: Global takedown disrupts Emotet
description: International action dismantles Emotetâ€™s infrastructure, reducing spam-driven initial access and downstream ransomware.
potential_impact_on_malware: Temporarily reduces loader availability and downstream infections
notes: Activity later resurfaced in modified forms; takedown had significant short-term impact
